Lemon Tree Gift - Large 5L pot, 50-60cm High - Leaves All Year - With Ripening Citrus Fruits - Suitable For Pot Growing Indoors

description: Order and send a Lemon Tree Gift to celebrate their special occasion and bring life, colour, and flavour into a loved ones home. By gifting this much loved tree, your recipient will gain a yearly bounty of bright yellow lemons, a wonderful symbol of freshness and healing. This beautiful lemon tree is a delight to give and receive as a unique gift for birthdays and other celebrations. Selected for its incredibly high quality, our evergreen citrus tree has glossy, dark green leaves all year round and can produce flowers and fruit in each season. The blossom has a strong, sweet fragrance that fills the room. Packed with flavour and vitamin C, our Lemon Tree Gift brings a little taste of summer all year round. Just as the lemon tree gift to the basket, add your message to a greetings card, and choose a day for delivery. We’ll handle the gift-wrapping. * Evergreen lemon tree (leaves all year round) * Delivered in a gift-wrapped 5L pot * Arrives at a height between 55-65cm * Suitable for indoor growth in the UK - in a greenhouse, patio, sun room, south facing porch or conservatory (not near central heating) * Can be placed outside in warm summer months (late June to September) * A really popular gift for birthdays and celebrations * Lemon trees are dispatched with ripening fruits if available.
